scripts.build:shared: yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-types build && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-validation build && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-constants build
scripts.build:all: yarn build:shared && yarn workspace frontend build && yarn workspace nodejs-service build
scripts.dev:shared: yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-types dev & yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-validation dev
scripts.clean:shared: yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-types clean && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-validation clean && yarn workspace @datifyy/shared-constants clean
